document_name: Sustainable Development of Utility Scale Wind Power Production

outputs.output_descr: 1. Wind power policy package. 2. Project facilitation for private sector in wind energy sector is enhanced.3. Wind map of selected areas and detailed wind resources assessment for commercially promising micro sites in the costal region. 4. National and Provincial capacity to manufacture install and operate commercial grid connected wind energy facilities. 5. Clearing house mechanism for awareness raising and dissemination of wind energy information to private developers, public sector, academic sector and civil society.6. Financial instruments for sustainable grid connected wind energy development. 7. Mainstreaming renewable energy.

project_descr: Sustainable Development of Unility-Scale Wind Power Production, Phase I
